website_summaries.verdict: This 12-pack of paper towel comes at a low price point and performs well, making it an impressive value.
pros: Bargain-priced paper towels produced by Amazon that are absorbent and long-lasting
These have the option to tear off a half a sheet, allowing users to conserve paper towel when it comes to small spills or clean ups
cons: These sheets may leave a bit of lint behind when wiping down glass

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not really a good value
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast; the product was as described; the quality is good. However, for the money I paid (and my situation) this was not a good value. (In the picture, Amazon's product is on the left; on the right is a product from a big-name bulk retailer.) I can buy paper towels similar to Amazon's quality and size at my local supermarket for less money. This product would be good for a busy family on auto-subscribe or someone who can't easily get to a store for whatever reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C.

customer_reviews.title: These are superior to overpriced national  store brands
customer_reviews.text: We (shamefully) go through a lot of paper towels. The cheap ones aren't worth the money so I always look for coupons for Bounty or Viva, large bulk packs. Presto! popped up on my app and I compared prices at different stores for the name brands. I compared length, package content, etc. As much as I love Amazon, I took a chance. I love these towels. They are strong and absorbent. If someone didn't see the packaging they wouldn't know it was a big overpriced store brand. I highly recommend these towels. I put the toilet paper on subscribe and save as well, I will review on Jan. 4th!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nance

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels are a really crummy and are priced ridiculously high. It pains me to have to write a bad review, because I am one of Amazons biggest fans! But, they have really missed the mark on these. I can get the same amount of Bounty rolls for 1/4 of the price also from Amazon, which I recommend that people do instead of getting the Presto brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: While the smaller sheets are meant to save money, the perforations that separate sheets don't work well. As a result, we often get 3 sheets instead of 1. So, we are now spending more money on paper towels instead of less. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Duke Hillard

customer_reviews.title: Hey Presto-we shrunk one!
customer_reviews.text: Overall these paper towels are comparable to competing brands. Never left a review before but was compelled to given that this is a quality assurance issue and these towels are by no means that cheap. The 12 rolls are packaged in 6 packs. One of the 6 packs had one roll that was shorter and less bulkier than the rest! I know Amazon can continue to do better.
customer_reviews.author: Heg

customer_reviews.title: Move over Bounty!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give these a try because many reviewers compared them to Bounty, which I find to be the best for the kitchen. Presto is wonderful and if I didn't see the label I would think they were Bounty. A great paper towel at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.author: M. Torma

customer_reviews.title: Now consistently takes 3 half sheets to dry my hands after washing them whereas with Bounty 2 half sheets were sufficient.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I liked them until I realized that with these paper towels it now consistently takes 3 half sheets to dry my hands after washing them whereas with Bounty 2 half sheets were sufficient. This adds up in cost and has been causing us to empty the waste basket in the bathroom more frequently. Therefore I conclude that they are not as absorbent. Maybe it is not fair to compare an economy paper towel to Bounty, but Bounty is what we have almost always used prior to trying this Amazon Brand.
customer_reviews.author: SocraticMethod

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: My order is missing half of it- this is insane !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy until you read the description
customer_reviews.text: Read the description before buying. It’s only 6 rolls of paper towels for $30! Seems like price gauging at its finest during the lockdown period. The description says 12 rolls because it’s 6 double rolls. Also there’s a picture of 2-6pks on display.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Works even better than other brands!
customer_reviews.text: I like the absorbency of these paper towels, effective on spills and as disposable place mats. Softer than expected, did not feel to me like industrial paper towels. At all. The indentations of the design helped increase absorbency. I love this product and find it to be a great value.
customer_reviews.author: forker girl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the bounty select a size that I usually buy. Better price per roll. I won't need to buy paper towels for a long time! I recommend trying these.
customer_reviews.author: Randyl B.

customer_reviews.title: The towels were fine, but more expensive than leading brands at local ...
customer_reviews.text: The towels were fine, but more expensive than leading brands at local stores. So I discontinued my Subscribe & Save of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: These are durable, great quality paper towels. I enjoy how big the rolls are and that they are tearable at the half size too.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best paper towels ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical on ordering these, as I am very picky about paper towels. I love the fact they are plain white, as I am not a fan of prints. The quality is great! Thicker than most, so they hold up well. They leave zero lint behind. I have had issues with other paper towels that do not tear along the perforations, these separate from the roll perfectly every time! I will be ordering Presto paper towel from now on!!
customer_reviews.author: Cocomotive

customer_reviews.title: Don't use these as napkins
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels are a nice solution for ordering online in bulk. They are your average paper towels that will mop up spills and dry your counters, but they're nothing super special – just your average paper towel. One thing that I noticed is that you should not use these as napkins. If you accidentally get these paper towels on your lips or mouth they leave a weird film on your lips and have a horrible taste. I've only ever experienced this phenomenon with these specific paper towels, other brands haven't had this issue when using them as a napkin.
customer_reviews.author: RobPlease

customer_reviews.title: Not Individually Wrapped.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Costco rolls are considerably cheaper and frequently on sale for an even vetter deal. But most importantly Costco rolls are individually wrapped up for added protection during storage. Will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: BigSlice

customer_reviews.title: Good price; they're paper towels.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fine (similar to Bounty?? Hard to say), and it's an OK value. You certainly will get what you pay for. The one I ordered had a little shorty roll in the package, so I told Amazon about it - they promptly sent me another package even though I'm not sure that was necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Reiter

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the texture. Low price but the roll is gone in a 24 period. Just order Scott again still the best value.
customer_reviews.author: TSA

customer_reviews.title: Paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure what to say. They’re huge rolls of paper towels. They dry hands and clean spills. Good quality, the rolls last forever even with 3 kids, 2 dogs, and an infantryman haha! It’ll take forever to run out, but I’ll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ChainsRemoved

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value and and without sacrificing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got 12 BIG roll for $2.29 each. I like them just as well as my regular Bounty brand that ran out from my local store (and they are cheaper). They don't have the rough gritty feeling that many cheaper paper towels have. They are absorbent and semi plush. They were plastic wrapped and boxed in original packaging and the big box was delivered right to my front porch! Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Texas KnowHow

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: costco kirkland is worth it. quality is ok paper is not thick
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: I have been a bounty user for awhile now. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a bounty user for awhile now. I thought I'd try based on the reviews. It compares equal on all categories next to bounty, including the select-a-size size (its the exact same size) i will be buying these from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of going to stores and finding nothing on shelves. These work.
customer_reviews.author: Etta Mae

customer_reviews.title: 5-star worthy
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave softness 3 stars is because they are a little dry feeling, but that's one thing I like about them. These absorb really well because they are not all fluff. These are very comparable, if not equal, to Bounty but for a much better price. Very good quality for an affordable price -- kind of rare these days, bringing good word-of-mouth advertising which leads to good reputation -- good business practice. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia G.

customer_reviews.title: Pick Presto Over Brand Names!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much with these, but as they were the only paper towels I've seen available during this time, I was more than willing to try them out. They are actually great! Very absorbent, soft, do not shred or break easily (unless you are intentionally trying to rip them), and are easy to dry if you want to reuse them. They tear off at perforated sections of 6 inches, so not too huge towel piece, thus minimizing waste. Overall very pleased with these! Would prefer to brand names honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' E

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Bounty but not as absorbent or strong
customer_reviews.text: Usually cheaper than Bounty "Flex-a-size" or "Quick size" but not as absorbent or strong. A Bounty "Flex-a-size" sheet full of water weighed 27 grams, whereas a Presto! sheet full of water weighed only 20 grams--that means it absorbs 6 grams less water per sheet. Furthermore, whether wet or dry, the Presto! paper towel tears more easily than Bounty. Search for "best paper towel" online and you'll see Bounty tops most reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Work well but pricey
customer_reviews.text: With the pandemic going on finding any brand name paper towels has been impossible. I've tried several supermarket brands and didnt like any. I like these paper towels but $29 for 12 rolls is a high price! I won't buy these again because of the price
customer_reviews.author: shanny D

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing, but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT giant or huge rolls, but the same size as a regular roll. Because, they were comparable in price to a regular roll, the cost differential was minimal, but you don't get anything more than what you paid for. UPDATE: the sheets practically disintegrate when you use them, almost as if they were made of toilet paper, so you end up using twice as many sheets. WASTE OF MONEY! Amazon is starting to spread themselves too thin and becoming the new China as far as quality of it's goods.
customer_reviews.author: PaleinPortland

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am brand loyal on just a few things I buy, and paper towel is one of them. About a year ago, I was on Amazon to purchase my Bounty towels. I saw the reviews on several Presto items, and I decided to give these towels a try. I am so happy I did! We have been extremely happy with our purchase. They are just like the brand name, and cheaper. We are happy with them and we save money to boot! Double bonus. We have even changed to the Presto brand for our toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon Workers...
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels arrived during a time of hoarding and greediness from my fellow Americans. I am grateful to the workers at Amazon who have risked their lives during a time of pandemic and uncertainty to ensure that people like myself receive essential paper goods such as this. Thank you, thank you, thank you! 🙏🏽
customer_reviews.author: DreamGirl

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and Economical!
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels are fantastic. I’ve been a Bounty user for years, but I had run out during the pandemic and found the price to be through the roof. Read great reviews about these Presto! paper towels and thought I’d try them. Certainly the price is an automatic plus. I was very pleased with the quality and absorbency. Are they as absorbent as the higher end quilted Bounty? No. But almost. And the savings made the switch to Presto! a no brainer! I’m in!
customer_reviews.author: Sewing Sonata

customer_reviews.title: Marginal paper towel.
customer_reviews.text: I found these paper towels to be marginal in overall quality and value. They are good in a pinch to order and receive quickly when you don't have time to run to the store, but I would look elsewhere if you can. I found the Kirkland paper towels from Costco or other name brands to be better with quality, absorbance, and value.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Not Comparable Quality
customer_reviews.text: When my bounty auto subscription was no longer available- the amazon brand was suggested. This product in no way is comparable to bounty, brawny, or even viva for that matter. Towels are very thin and somewhat abrasive- no thirst pockets and single ply. Will never buy again- while I am at- do not purchase amazon batteries either. Dont get me wrong Amazon- you are amazing but stop selling your own items if the quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Carmon Kutcher

customer_reviews.title: Huge rolls!
customer_reviews.text: There are 158 sheets per roll. And 12 rolls per case. Not the best price but I was running low on paper towels and the stores in my area didn’t have good stock of them so I bought them from amazon for now. I don’t recommend it if you are very cost conscious but the paper towels are good themselves. I would buy them again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely cannot stand these. Hard to believe paper towels can annoy me this much but they do. It's near impossible to pull sheeta off the roll without tearing them and holding the towels first. They almost always rip apart before you can get a full sheet . I love 95% of Amazon products, these are bad, really bad
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: I like these paper towels!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Kirkland paper towels at Costco, but I'm isolated at home due to the Coronavirus pandemic and Costco is the last place I'd ask my husband to shop these days. I got lucky one day and found Bounty on Amazon. When I needed to reorder, Anazon was out of all paper towels, but some sketchy ones I figured were from China. Checked daily and finally found these Amazon brand paper towels and took a chance. Happy to report they are great! I am completely satisfied with them and will order again if they're available.
customer_reviews.author: Susan MannionTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Corona crap
customer_reviews.text: I like this , it's cheaper. Not necessarily any better than say Bounty. I bet I will get this Amazon product this month. All other items ( non- amazon product) have been out of stock or delayed for 2 months. My subscription to most products I use are out. But Amazon is still in business. Amazon must have bigger warehouses. Cottonelle catch up on production.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Quien

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. I feel like I am using more than I would have used for name brand paper towels. I will spend a little more next time for a designer brand.
customer_reviews.author: James Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value for paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from these, as we usually go with the big brand names, but honestly, they are great quality and work just as well as any paper towel we've used. Being able to choose the size of the sheet I want to use is a plus, as well, and they make both great napkins and spill-cleaners. I'm pleased enough with these that I'll continue to get these through Subscribe & Save and forgo my monthly Costco paper towel purchases from now on.
customer_reviews.author: s3rndpt

customer_reviews.title: The bad reviews made me nervous, but they are wrong
customer_reviews.text: These are actually better than bounty. Every store has been sold out and I haven't been able to find any near my home. I saw these and looked at all the reviews and decided even though there are a few 1 stars...these deserve the five stars. It was only like $28 and I was willing to roll the dice on them. I am a winner winner chicken dinner, lol. I want to put this on subscribe so that I won't be out anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: lindsB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy better than other paper towels
customer_reviews.text: The paper towels are thick and really absorbent. I really only need the small square to clean a small counter. The tubing is a little narrow so it was hard putting it on my holder. I guess they narrowed it to give you more paper towels ( which I’m ok with).
customer_reviews.author: Cozy Novel Reader

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: As someone who relies on public transportation and doesn’t have a car to transport big purchases, I like that I can purchase these paper towels in bulk and have them delivered to my apartment. However, the value for money is not really there. Other name brand paper towels are much less expensive and more absorbent. These do the job of a basic paper towel, but that’s about it. I go through them way more quickly than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: MarinaLea

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described - make sure to check size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of its description and specifications listed in the ad. The specification show that it's 22.18 x 17.18 x 11.61 inches. However, the actual size is 11 x 6 inches. So, if you're looking for a larger single sheet paper towel, this is not it. Additionally, they seem a bit thin and stiff. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Presto Paper Towels Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy the Presto Paper Towels because of all the normal reasons - they're going to be flimsy, they're not going to be absorbent, I'm going to have to use twice as many of them. Boy was I wrong! These paper towels are very nice and I have noticed nothing different between them and the name brand ones that I usually buy. If someone blindfolded me and told me to compare them by touch alone, I wouldn't be able to tell the difference. Do yourself a favor and give these a try. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JoanaFark

customer_reviews.title: Strong paper quality
customer_reviews.text: Strong and good quality paper towels. I love the flex size option. The product was delivered a day sooner than promised. I am very satisfied with the purchase and transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeous21

customer_reviews.title: Pretty close to name brands
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Charming or similar mega rolls because I like softness and durability. Presto brand isn’t bad could be made a little thicker. I am disabled so shopping can be a challenge. As far as price goes I buy charmin on sale usually 9 mega rolls for 10-12 dollars. But if you add in travel cost to grocery store price of Presto isn’t bad . I would probably buy again and recommend it others .All in all good product
customer_reviews.author: susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing:  rolls are defective
customer_reviews.text: Just opened these and the rolls are literally fraying at the top. So when you pull a piece, you get small shreds dropping off. They arrived in a box so I don't believe they were damaged in shipping. Not recommended and would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: schmelke

customer_reviews.title: Nope, Presto Is Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Bounty for years. They are the most durable, absorbent towel I’ve found and comparing to Presto, they are a better value. For every half sheet of Bounty, I’ve used at least three of the Presto half sheets; absorbency and durability are the reasons for this. The “double” rolls of Presto are significantly smaller than Bounty , as well. I bought these because Bounty is in shortage, at least where I live. Sorry Amazon, but I appreciate people’s honesty in reviews so I have to tell it like it is...at least for me🙂
customer_reviews.author: PawPawMI

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced paper towels.  A big flop
customer_reviews.text: 30 bucks for 12? It’s extremely over priced over the leading NAME BRAND version. A pack of 12 bounty advanced costs 25 bucks at Costco and pre covid it was on sale from that price. Buying the house brand is suppose to save you money, and offer great use. For example I compare this to the Kirkland Signature towels. A thing of 12 for about 18 bucks or Members Mark a thing of 15 for 18 bucks. Now that is actually saving me money and they work great too. They’re also smaller then those house brands too and even Bounty Advanced. I bought these out of desperation because nothing else was available
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: great for pandemic
customer_reviews.text: Great product for prices especially during the pandemic. That is, if you can purchase due to the hoarders buying it all up. What do you think? This is going to help you during pandemic. Go use the water hose.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8brd

customer_reviews.title: PRESTO - 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews, and took a chance. These paper towels deserve the praise they have received. No silly frills - pretty pictures, embossing, or perfumes. They simply do the job as described. Individual sheets slightly larger than standard pick-a-size/select-a--size sheets. Definitely with the money! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: T. F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what Amazon says they are!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was most pleasantly surprised when these paper towels were delivered. I was not expecting this level of quality! Presto paper towels rival any of the commercial brands out there, in size, softness & durability. I received a big box of 12 large rolls, before finding out they were no longer available! Hopefully that will change!
customer_reviews.author: Kaybee

customer_reviews.title: Were paper towels ever reasonably priced? I can’t remember.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these because I thought they would compare with the bounty paper towels I brought previously. The bounty was almost too big to fit on my holder and they lasted for a long time. These aren’t as big but were similarly priced. They don’t last as long but they’re better than Scott and easier to get. I feel like paper towel prices are too high in general.
customer_reviews.author: Marbles

customer_reviews.title: Bounty has a competitor that's just as good Presto!
customer_reviews.text: for me it was bounty or the rest nothing compared!? well when paper towels became impossible to get any kind, I happened upon this Presto brand, and I was surprised to find a paper towel that is just as good as bounty! I noticed that these too are out of stock, but if they return don't hesitate Buy them you won't be disappointed, good paper towels!
customer_reviews.author: frank w

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly way better than I expected. Doesn’t feel like a cheap paper towel and I’m happy about that because with the pandemic we picked whatever we could get and I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon pulls a bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: The paper towel themselves are just fine, but they aren't a value anymore because Amazon changed the price. I was on an auto-subscribe option and the price increased $7 since I first signed up. Also the rolls are a lot smaller than when I started. I'll just go back to getting them from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Isn't Better
customer_reviews.text: These are no substitute for Bounty paper towels. The Presto towels are thin, not very absorbent and have a harsh, stiff feel. They may cost less than Bounty but you have to use more of them to get the job done. In short not as good as Bounty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It is NOT absorbent at all, scratchy, awful. I had been pleasantly surprised by Amazon's Presto toilet tissue which is excellent so I thought I would give this a try. If I could afford to throw out every roll I would. Don't waste your money. If you can't find or afford Viva paper towels, try Bounty or something else. That's what I should have done. I like to write positive reviews but there isn't anything good I can say about this.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy & very Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try these before, never had good luck with generic paper towels...until Presto. These feel & perform as well as Bounty, and Bounty, just so you know, has been rated 'best paper-towel' out of all the brand name products by Cook's Country - they rate a lot of the items they use on their PBS Cook's Country Kitchen program & I happened to catch this little factoid on their show. I'm also hooked on their toilet tissue when I can't get the kind the Bears like for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: frugal buyer

customer_reviews.title: Switched from name brand. Durable a little less absorbent but alot less expensive, sooo worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about making the switch from a name brand paper towel that rhymes with CLOWNEY, and i am glad I did. These are a great value. I will admit they Arent as absorbent as the name brand one, but it is definitely comparable. It wont be better then the name brand, but the amount you pay for these compared to the name brand, its definitely worth it to get these. These are mine and my wifes go to paper towels now. Can't beat it for the price. They are just as durable as the name brand, they last just as long (if not longer). I was nervous about making the switch but I'm very happy we did!
customer_reviews.author: @mazon is why I'm broke!

customer_reviews.title: Not a paid review...we forgot they weren't Bounty
customer_reviews.text: These are comparable to Bounty. No complaints. I just went to check the last time I bought paper towels and not only did I get a memory refresher that what sits in my kitchen isn't Bounty, they were last purchased October 2018...it's now nearly June 2019. There are only two of us that live here and guests use a good chunk of the paper towels but this 12 pack has lasted a long time. Price pending, we will repurchase because they get the job done at a cheaper price but the same high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Equally good as Bounty Select-A-Size
customer_reviews.text: Since the pandemic started, it's been difficult to find the Bounty Select-A-Size paper towels like I'm used to buying. I've been getting those for a long time because they've just always worked well for me. Anyways, I decided to give these a try after doing a bunch of research, and I find that they're effectively identical. They're equally durable and absorbent, and they cost less. You don't even need to deal with there being like a dozen different sizes of rolls with confusing names! 5/5, would recommend anyone buys these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I got these towels because they were a little cheaper and we go through a lot of paper towels due to pets and general clumsiness (on my part). These work great and they are perferated so I can actually tear off some squares to use to cover the small bowl I use when I melt butter in the microwave. I never thought I'd actually use a small square, but it works perfectly to prevent the butter from splattering all over the microwave. The towels seem to absorb well (just like any other paper towel) and they work great for cleaning our kitchen counters and cleaning up after our pets. I haven't had any issues with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Goebel Padgett

customer_reviews.title: PROS AND CONS
customer_reviews.text: PROS I like you can take a little or a lot. Sometimes I need just a TINY piece of paper towel, so that feature is great ABSORBENT- no prob there PRICE - not a bad price for what you get SIZE - DEFINITELY MEGA! A LOT FOR THE BUCKS! TEXTURE - REALLY LIKE TEXTURE. ABSORBENT YET SOFT. CONS NONE. I like these as much as any other brand I have tried and have tried all the major ones.
customer_reviews.author: pleineluneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tears correctly and easily
customer_reviews.text: The last round of paper towels we bought required two hands, three prayers to 4 different deities, and the leftmost upper lift feather from an Icelandic platypus to tear into the desired section. Even then it was still quite iffy. These paper towels will tear at the tear line you want 90% of the time, and seem to be a bit softer than most. Just not too soft though, so no big hit to my manliness. This stuff also does not disintegrate into small fibers when wiping up liquids, which is kind of important when you are lazy and don’t want to clean up the cleaning up because you’re trying to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Do

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Brawny or Bounty
customer_reviews.text: I would rate these very similar to Brawny or Bounty. I most likely will not go back to the other brands. Its such a convenience to have them shipped right to my door in bulk. They tear easily at the perforated edge. Big rolls, should fit in most holders unless you have a decorative holder that sits on the counter with a metal base that covers part of the roll. It doesn't bother me though, we just set it on top until we use some and then it falls into place in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: tayzeanna

customer_reviews.title: In the middle, they're good enough
customer_reviews.text: I'd rate these Amazon branded Presto paper towels in the middle between cheap no-name generic paper towels to the more expensive Brawny brand paper towels. I'll buy these again, they're good enough being in the middle. Note that they do seem to have some ever so slightly sticky residue on them that gets onto my hands when drying off my hands, although I've noticed the exact same with many other brands too.
customer_reviews.author: Claudetta

customer_reviews.title: It's no viva, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Being we haven't left the house in months we decided to order paper towel online. I was simply reminded just how EXENSIVE paper toweling is! So, the search began. After sifting through some reviews I landed on the amazon brand. It defiantly is not viva, but with that said, it also does the job and the price isn't terrible It absorbs without simply pushing liquid around. It doesn't break apart and leave pieces all over. Actually it works better than Viva in regards to windows, there is no lint left. This is my second order and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Bounty ..
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised on how good this product is. The quality feels and works just as good as Bounty paper towels. At first i was just looking for anything due to the pandemic. Can't find any paper towels in stores these days let alone toilet paper. So I turned to the next best thing Amazon. Amazon has really come through for my family. This was a great buy I recieved this package fast and in good condition. I definitely got my money's worth. I have spread the word on this product to my friends and family so they too can invest in Amazon and their products.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: No other
customer_reviews.text: OK so I’ve always thought the bounty paper towels were the best that there was out there... During the pandemic we kind of stocked up when we could on some of the paper towels since Amazon was all sold out. I absolutely love the Amazon paper towels I’ve been buying them for the last several years. Tried the bounty because Amazon is sold out and they were horrible compared to how much I like the Amazon paper towels. They’re extremely absorbent I feel like they’re thicker than some of the other ones I bought at the store and there come at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes a "Store brand" is better than the "name brand"
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying a "store brand" when it comes to toilet tissue but then again this store is Amazon so I figured why not give it a try. Normally I would purchase cottonelle and I have to say the Presto is as good or possibly better. It's durable and soft etc. The only downside if there is one is it fits my dispenser perfectly but not my holder I normally out 6 rolls in. This is not the fault of the tissue my dispenser is simply made for smaller rolls so if they had different sizes (and they might) it would be a plus for son users. All in all BUY It and you won't be disa
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how flimsy and thin these are. They're just a bit heavier than a napkin. You need to double, sometimes triple each section to equal one section of Bounty. I also wish that they had been individually wrapped. I don't have much storage space, so I usually store the rolls where ever they fit, but I can't really do that with these.
customer_reviews.author: DH in TX

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Brawny towels
customer_reviews.text: A good choice in these times of paper shortages. I would prefer Bounty towels but they are out of stock in my local grocery stores. These will do quite nicely for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Can't Use: Can't Unbox
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has shipped these towels in a box that is so firmly glued together that I cannot open the box. I can slice through the packing tape, but actually opening the box requires tearing through the glued together flips. Has anyone else had this problem with getting to their merchandise?
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Yes! All the yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing Amazon brand for the win!!! I have loved everything else we have tried from Amazon and thought "why not!" We don't use a ton of paper towels in my house so this pack will seriously last us forever but I LOVE how absolutely amazing these are. They are super absorbent, soft but not too soft and good quality. Super recommend! You can't go wrong with the pricing too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shivonne T

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent paper towels. They clean up messes well and are durable. I prefer these over many box store brands. These have the same if not better quality for more convenience and easy if getting them shipped to the house. Our house stays stocked with these. Glad they offer a good product like this at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A.

customer_reviews.title: Great paper towels!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the negative reviews and was apprehensive about purchasing these towels. Now that I have received them I really don’t know what people are unhappy about. I always purchase the Kirkland/Costco brand and frankly I can’t tell the difference between the two brands. I’m very happy with them and would not hesitate to purchase them again. I’m a very honest and probably a picky reviewer. But these towels are great! You shouldn’t hesitate to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as absorbent as I would like -- not enough of a price difference to make up for this.
customer_reviews.author: Arese

customer_reviews.title: moderately good product
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to again be able to order these towels. This is a fairly good paper towel, Sometimes will tear where you want it. And absorbs about the way a Scot towel does. The box it comes in--however--is a nightmare to get open. It is apparently meant to be able to ship and not get damaged--and it seems to do that. They did not however-EVER want you to cut and open it! So-if you already have enough box issues--this may not be one you want to tackle.
customer_reviews.author: D.Woodward

customer_reviews.title: HUGE rolls!  Just as good as popular brands.
customer_reviews.text: I usually opt for a different brand when I purchase paper towels, but decided to give these a try. My first reaction was that these a huge rolls! I like a bigger roll because they last longer and the select-a-size comes in handy when you just need a napkin or to wipe a little one's face. I find them to be very similar to Bounty or Brawny. Thick, strong, no lint left behind. Perfect for windows and glass cleaning. The price is certainly right and the quality is there. Bonus - they're delivered to your door! Cant go wrong there! Try the Presto! brand out.
customer_reviews.author: Mama V

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, tears precisely; half sizes allow for precision usage
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that I would have a strong opinion on paper towels? On my standing paper towel rack, it fits well. The half-sized sheets allow me to pull out just as much as I need. They are absorbent. In brief, I don't have to think about them. They just work. Contrast this to other products I tried recently from the supermarket. For those, all of the above were questionable. One would think that paper towels are a commodity-type product: no: these work better.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Yes, smells really bad. Used the first roll for napkins at dinner yesterday. That really did it. I got another roll out just to be sure. The outside of the roll does not smell as bad but take the first few towels off the roll and it hits you. Maybe I got a bad batch, I don't know but there is no way we can use these.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Never got it, so...just got a "sorry" and a refund, but I really needed the paper towels. I liked them when I used to get them. Is there a run on paper towels now?
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Very poor absorption.
customer_reviews.text: These are for cheaper than a basic store brand but cost more than twice as much. For the money, but a name brand with proven performance. These towels had trouble drying a bead of coffee off a kitchen counter. They don't dry your hands after you wash them and shake off the access, you need to use three or four towels. Very poor absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Null

customer_reviews.title: Very nice premium paper towel!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these paper towels. We recently ran out of our supply (we buy a case at a time) so my husband grabbed another brand at the store to tide us over until our Presto! shipment arrived. Ugh, I don't know what brand the grocery store ones are, but they are terrible and I couldn't wait to have the Presto! paper towels back in action. We use them as napkins at casual dinners, clean up around the house, pet messes, kid messes, etc. I also like to use them for nail polish removal (cotton balls tend to leave strings to catch in your nail polish). They are tough and hold up well when scrubbing things.
customer_reviews.author: W. Laufersweiler

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the cheap Walmart brand paper towels. I figured I’d try these out and buy in bulk and maybe I’d save money in the long run. I love these paper towels. So much more absorbent and durable. One of the rolls has lasted us almost a week and a half. We go through a lot of paper towels too, I have an infant. Looks like these are going to last a while! I will definitely re-purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cicellyt

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another brand of paper towels again! These were so much better than I was expecting!! Comparable to Bounty and honestly I didn’t run out fast like I usually do with other brands. These lasted almost two months and I have a family of 6 - 4 small kiddos and 2 adults - and we use A LOT OF PAPER TOWELS IN OUR HOUSE. very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Paper Towels
customer_reviews.text: Don't think that just because this is a generic brand mean that it's inferior to name brands or wholesale generics. I would even go as far as to say that these are the best paper towels I've ever used - and I'm kind of particular. These met my needs: 1. select a size 2. absorbency 3. feel 4. value/convenience If paper towel shortages weren't a thing because of COVID-19 I most likely wouldn't have tried Presto. I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Fitting less for more $$$$ again!
customer_reviews.text: Most every company has reduced the quality of their products & reduced the quantity of their products! This is another company doing the same. 6 months ago Bounty made terr sheets thinner, we know BC we have many packs bought in 2017! But the $price$ is even gone up, for less picker upper 😳
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, I could have gotten a higher quality paper towel, these are not very soft and not very absorbent but I purchased them because Amazon inaccurately rated them so high. Not going to buy these again; Viva are a much softer and cheaper towel.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Functioning within established parameters
customer_reviews.text: It's toilet paper, and it works fine. I mean, my fingers don't get wet, so points for that. It does the job as one would wish, and um... respects the delicate areas appropriately, shall we say? Which is to say that it's soft. The only problem is that the rolls are huge. Which it actually says plainly in the listing, but I decided to risk it anyway. Unfortunately it doesn't fit in my holder thing until it's been used a bit. My bad. I'd buy it again, but maybe in the size one notch down from "huge."
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Great paper towels and arrived during tough time
customer_reviews.text: Great paper towels, was great to see these IN STOCK and available for prime during a time where all of my local supermarkets were still empty. Don't see why I'd ever go to the store for paper towels anymore when I can just order these when I run low.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Better than name brand imho
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Far better than the name brands. Scott is thin, bounty and brawny are scratchy, viva sticks to the next sheet even with pretty design. This id it for me. Unless Presto or Amazon changes something, please don't, I'm using nothing else
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Stay safe and sanitized!!!😍
customer_reviews.text: I have a subscription in these paper towels. They are great paper towels..they are used each day in the kitchen and a roll in each bathroom counter. It's a better way to keep sanitized..no one wants to share a hand towel...smiling... Thank you Amazon!*🙏
customer_reviews.author: Rose 🌹

customer_reviews.title: Decent Paper Towels
customer_reviews.text: These towels are good. They are a good size, a good thickness, and I like the select-a-size to reduce waste. They tear nicely. They are way better than Sparkle, but they are not quite as good as a Kirkland paper towels. Unfortunately, ever since Covid, Costco is out every time I go. So, these are a decent substitute in the meantime, albeit more expensive. I hope this review was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Decent paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I usually order the bounty select a size big rolls but decided to give these try. The name presto! Is corny but the absorbancy is fine and they tear well. The rolls are a regular size so I feel like I go through one in a day (I have kids). The real downside to these paper towels is the packaging. The box they ship in has the flaps completely glued down. Normally I wouldn't even mention something like this but it's a hell of a struggle to open it and break it down for recycling. For that reason alone I may just stick to bounty.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing different about the amazon brand vs Bounty or other companies. This is also a subscribe and save option, which is great! We go though a ton of paper towels with our puppies, so we need to get a good price, and we did.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Linus

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best !
customer_reviews.text: I've reordered these towels 6 times now, and I've used many brands over the years . It is not just that these are less expensive, ( which they are) but the Presto Brand towels are Simply the BEST !! Better than ALL the rest !
customer_reviews.author: Christy Continued

customer_reviews.title: Worst paper towel I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: How does this have so many positive reviews? This is literally the thinnest paper towel I have ever seen in my life. Maybe good for 1 wipe of the mouth, but expect to use 4-5 sheets to wipe up any sort of spill or amount of water. My toilet paper would be better as a paper towel than this joke named Pesto!
customer_reviews.author: alundra

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbant and poor value for money
customer_reviews.text: I got these in a pinch when my normal brands were sold out and I wouldn't buy them again. Very poor value and quality compared to Target and Costco. The absorbancy is pathetic - it takes a pile of sheets to do what I could do with 2 Target sheets. The only plus is they're the softest paper towels I've used, but that's not really what I'm looking for in a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: lo_dash

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, Huge Roll, 12 Count = 30 Regular Rolls
product_meta.description: Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are strong and absorbent, ideal for tough messes. Up to 75% more absorbent versus leading 1-ply brand, each huge roll lasts 2.5X longer than a regular paper towel roll (based on a regular roll with 63 half sheets). Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are PEFC certified and made with pulp sourced from sustainably managed forests and controlled sources.
feature_bullets: Up to 75% more absorbent versus leading 1-ply brand
Includes 12 Huge Rolls (2 Packs of 6 Huge Rolls) of 158 2-ply sheets per roll
12 Huge Rolls = 30 Regular Rolls (based on a regular roll with 63 sheets)
Flex-a-Size lets you suit your towel to your mess
Made with pulp sourced from sustainably managed forests and controlled sources
Running low? Restock by asking, “Alexa, order Presto! paper towels” through your Alexa device
Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
